title: Banned perma without Warning.
body:
So here's the deal..i got perma banned without any Chat restriction or 14 days ban just insta perma ...i've spent money in this account Riot..also i got banned for 1 game i played with trollers who trolled my game and callin me toxic when i wasnt and u can see my chat log..I want my account back because thats not fair...without ANY warning...i want you to join and see the game i've played and see my teamchat when leona and aatrox was flaming me...


My chat log..and at some points when i call him ''idiot'' its because they were flaming me so hard for no reason..to explain u better i was jungler, they were losing their lane and it was my fault when they died each death for no reason ....

Game 1
Pre-Game
Jhin Carries: aatrox from last game :P
In-Game
Jhin Carries: LOL?
Jhin Carries: god hahaha
Jhin Carries: i suicided
Jhin Carries: WTF?!
Jhin Carries: Are you SERIOUS?>
Jhin Carries: 500 dmg 9 mins game?
Jhin Carries: this is bullshit,.
Jhin Carries: lol?
Jhin Carries: what?
Jhin Carries: play mid aatrox
Jhin Carries: flame me for nothing
Jhin Carries: report aatrox toxic thank you.
Jhin Carries: see flamer? XD
Jhin Carries: he dies..its my fault
Jhin Carries: playing aatrox mid.
Jhin Carries: didnt see that
Jhin Carries: ARE YOU IDIOT?
Jhin Carries: how cna i know lol
Jhin Carries: premade with aatrox?
Jhin Carries: w/e toxic team
Jhin Carries: again
Jhin Carries: i didnt say anything
Jhin Carries: you flame
Jhin Carries: DUDE for real this aatrox dude...
Jhin Carries: flaming me so hard..
Jhin Carries: w/e
Jhin Carries: flame more
Jhin Carries: toxic.
Jhin Carries: |aatropx mid.
Jhin Carries: 1-3
Jhin Carries: what?
Jhin Carries: whaaaaaat? XD
Jhin Carries: hope u get banned for lying and toxicity buddy...
Jhin Carries: for?
Jhin Carries: what a toxic player u are
Jhin Carries: ..
Jhin Carries: hope u get banned for real
Jhin Carries: you are that guy who ;''loses lane, jungler's fault''
Jhin Carries: cuz u cant lane
